vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Job.42.14;
daughter of: Job (H0347);
sister of: Jemimah (H3224), Keren-happuch (H7163)
§ Kezia = "cassia"
the 2nd of the daughters born to Job after his trial
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基洗亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "肉桂"
約伯經試煉後所生的第二個女兒 (伯 42:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基洗亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "肉桂"
约伯经试炼后所生的第二个女儿 (伯 42:14)
